import React from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import {Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card} from "react-bootstrap" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
